attributes.action: Halt, Over political correctness and positive discrimination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop over political correctness. E.g. Banning of Crosses and Nativity scenes, because local governments think it may be offensive. 

Stop positive discrimination, judge on abilities not on race. 

Be equal. Be free.

rejection.details: There are several petitions already on this theme...
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
